description: [[Malay styles and titles|Datoâ€™]] '''Sheila Majid''' {{post-nominals|post-noms=[[Malay styles and titles|YBD]], [[Orders, decorations, and medals of Pahang|DIMP]]}} (born '''Shaheila binti Abdul Majid'''; 3 January 1965), is a [[Malaysians|Malaysian]] pop singer who is best known for her 1986 song, "Sinaran".  Her musical prowess especially in the genre of jazz music has led her to be dubbed as '''Malaysia's Queen of Jazz'''.
